remarks: Commutativity law for substitution.  This theorem was incorrectly used as our previous version of ~ pm11.07 but may still be useful. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 17-Jun-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Jim Kingdon, 22-Jan-2018.)
statement:
sbcom4 $p |- ( [ w / x ] [ y / z ] ph <-> [ y / x ] [ w / z ] ph ) $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d w x z $.
